content:
Yes, KTH has won numerous awards and recognition for its sustainability efforts over the years. Some notable achievements include:

1. KTH was ranked one of the top 50 sustainable universities in the world in the UI GreenMetric World University Ranking 2020, recognizing its efforts in implementing environmentally friendly and sustainable policies and practices.

2. In 2020, KTH was awarded the Solar Impulse Efficient Solution Label for its Vertical Greenhouse project, which aims to promote sustainable food production through highly-efficient and sustainable vertical greenhouse technology.

3. In 2019, KTH won the prestigious European Green Capital Award, recognizing its efforts in promoting sustainable development, energy efficiency, and climate change mitigation through its research, programs, and initiatives.

4. KTH's Green Leap initiative, promoting sustainable innovation and entrepreneurship, was recognized with the 2019 Stockholm Environmental Prize.

These awards and recognition demonstrate KTH's strong commitment to sustainability and its leadership in promoting sustainability through its research, education, and innovation initiatives.
